text: Paul McKay (born c. 1947) was a Canadian football player who played for the Hamilton Tiger-Cats and Calgary Stampeders. He won the Grey Cup with Hamilton in 1972. He played college football at the University of Toronto.http://www.justsportsstats.com/footballstatsindex.php?player_id=mckaypau001 ==References== Category:1940s births Category:Living people Category:Hamilton Tiger-Cats players Category:Calgary Stampeders players Category:Grey Cup champions Category:Canadian football defensive backs Category:Toronto Varsity Blues football players
title: Paul McKay (Canadian football)
